tool_description: Currency API providing official global currency rates. This API provides currency rates for official money units, precious metals and BTC.
name: Global Currency
title: Global Currency

api_list.name: Get All Currencies
api_list.description: This endpoint will return all currencies(173 items) that API supports.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://global-currency.p.rapidapi.com/currencies"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "global-currency.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Exchange Rate For Specific Currency
api_list.description: This endpoint will return a specific rate multiplied by given amount depending given currency codes.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://global-currency.p.rapidapi.com/currency/EUR/USD/10"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "global-currency.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://global-currency.p.rapidapi.com/currency/{is_from}/{to}/{amount}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "global-currency.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
